title: Foundation Basics
description: Learn the fundamental concepts and basic skills

curriculums.title: Count to 100 by ones and tens
curriculums.description: Count forward beginning from any given number
curriculums.subject: Counting and Cardinality
curriculums.content: Description: Count forward beginning from any given number. Standards: K.CC.1.

curriculums.title: Count objects and understand cardinality
curriculums.description: Count to tell the number of objects
curriculums.subject: Counting and Cardinality
curriculums.content: Description: Count to tell the number of objects. Standards: K.CC.4, K.CC.5.

curriculums.title: Addition and subtraction within 5
curriculums.description: Represent addition and subtraction with objects
curriculums.subject: Operations and Algebraic Thinking
curriculums.content: Description: Represent addition and subtraction with objects. Standards: K.OA.1, K.OA.2.

curriculums.title: Basic Arithmetic (Grundlæggende regning)
curriculums.description: Addition, subtraction, multiplication and division with focus on understanding
curriculums.subject: Mathematics (Matematik)
curriculums.content: Description: Addition, subtraction, multiplication and division with focus on understanding. Standards: DK-MATH-FOLK-BASIC.

curriculums.title: Reading Comprehension (Læseforståelse)
curriculums.description: Developing reading skills and text comprehension
curriculums.subject: Danish Language (Dansk)
curriculums.content: Description: Developing reading skills and text comprehension. Standards: DK-DANSK-READ.

title: Building Blocks
description: Understand core principles and building blocks

curriculums.title: Addition and subtraction within 20
curriculums.description: Use strategies to add and subtract within 20
curriculums.subject: Operations and Algebraic Thinking
curriculums.content: Description: Use strategies to add and subtract within 20. Standards: 1.OA.1, 1.OA.2.

curriculums.title: Count to 120
curriculums.description: Count to 120, starting at any number
curriculums.subject: Number and Operations in Base Ten
curriculums.content: Description: Count to 120, starting at any number. Standards: 1.NBT.1.

curriculums.title: Basic English Communication
curriculums.description: Fundamental English speaking and listening skills
curriculums.subject: English (Engelsk)
curriculums.content: Description: Fundamental English speaking and listening skills. Standards: DK-ENG-BASIC.

curriculums.title: Addition and subtraction within 100
curriculums.description: Use strategies to solve word problems
curriculums.subject: Operations and Algebraic Thinking
curriculums.content: Description: Use strategies to solve word problems. Standards: 2.OA.1.

curriculums.title: Nature Studies (Naturstudier)
curriculums.description: Understanding the natural world through observation and experimentation
curriculums.subject: Science (Natur/teknik)
curriculums.content: Description: Understanding the natural world through observation and experimentation. Standards: DK-NT-NATURE.

curriculums.title: Multiplication and division
curriculums.description: Understand multiplication and division concepts
curriculums.subject: Operations and Algebraic Thinking
curriculums.content: Description: Understand multiplication and division concepts. Standards: 3.OA.1, 3.OA.2.

curriculums.title: Understanding fractions
curriculums.description: Understand fractions as numbers
curriculums.subject: Number and Operations—Fractions
curriculums.content: Description: Understand fractions as numbers. Standards: 3.NF.1, 3.NF.2.

curriculums.title: Multi-step word problems
curriculums.description: Solve multi-step word problems with whole numbers
curriculums.subject: Operations and Algebraic Thinking
curriculums.content: Description: Solve multi-step word problems with whole numbers. Standards: 4.OA.1, 4.OA.2.

curriculums.title: Fraction equivalence
curriculums.description: Understand fraction equivalence and comparison
curriculums.subject: Number and Operations—Fractions
curriculums.content: Description: Understand fraction equivalence and comparison. Standards: 4.NF.1, 4.NF.2.

curriculums.title: Count to 100 by ones and tens
curriculums.description: Count to 100 by ones and by tens
curriculums.subject: Mathematics
curriculums.content: Description: Count to 100 by ones and by tens. Standards: CCSS.MATH.CONTENT.K.CC.A.1.

curriculums.title: Decimal place value
curriculums.description: Understand decimal place value system
curriculums.subject: Number and Operations in Base Ten
curriculums.content: Description: Understand decimal place value system. Standards: 5.NBT.1, 5.NBT.3.

curriculums.title: Adding and subtracting fractions
curriculums.description: Add and subtract fractions with unlike denominators
curriculums.subject: Number and Operations—Fractions
curriculums.content: Description: Add and subtract fractions with unlike denominators. Standards: 5.NF.1, 5.NF.2.

curriculums.title: Ratios and rates
curriculums.description: Understand ratio concepts and use ratio language
curriculums.subject: Ratios and Proportional Relationships
curriculums.content: Description: Understand ratio concepts and use ratio language. Standards: 6.RP.1, 6.RP.2.

curriculums.title: Negative numbers
curriculums.description: Understand and use positive and negative numbers
curriculums.subject: The Number System
curriculums.content: Description: Understand and use positive and negative numbers. Standards: 6.NS.5, 6.NS.6.

curriculums.title: Intro: Scientific Inquiry
curriculums.description: Investigation, experimentation, and evidence-based reasoning

curriculums.content: Competency: Scientific Inquiry. Description: Investigation, experimentation, and evidence-based reasoning. Goal: SDG 4.7 - Education for Sustainable Development

curriculums.title: Ratios and rates
curriculums.description: Understand ratio concepts and use ratio language
curriculums.subject: Ratios and Proportional Relationships
curriculums.content: Description: Understand ratio concepts and use ratio language. Standards: 6.RP.1, 6.RP.2.

curriculums.title: Negative numbers
curriculums.description: Understand and use positive and negative numbers
curriculums.subject: The Number System
curriculums.content: Description: Understand and use positive and negative numbers. Standards: 6.NS.5, 6.NS.6.

curriculums.title: Proportional relationships
curriculums.description: Compute unit rates and analyze proportional relationships
curriculums.subject: Ratios and Proportional Relationships
curriculums.content: Description: Compute unit rates and analyze proportional relationships. Standards: 7.RP.1, 7.RP.2.

curriculums.title: Operations with rational numbers
curriculums.description: Apply properties of operations with rational numbers
curriculums.subject: The Number System
curriculums.content: Description: Apply properties of operations with rational numbers. Standards: 7.NS.1, 7.NS.2.

curriculums.title: Digital Literacy
curriculums.description: Critical evaluation of digital information and responsible technology use
curriculums.subject: Digital Skills
curriculums.content: Competency: Digital Literacy. Description: Critical evaluation of digital information and responsible technology use. Goal: SDG 4.4 - Technical and Vocational Skills

title: Specialized Topics
description: Dive into specialized areas of study

curriculums.title: Exponents and scientific notation
curriculums.description: Work with integer exponents and scientific notation
curriculums.subject: Expressions and Equations
curriculums.content: Description: Work with integer exponents and scientific notation. Standards: 8.EE.1, 8.EE.3.

curriculums.title: Functions
curriculums.description: Understand functions and function notation
curriculums.subject: Functions
curriculums.content: Description: Understand functions and function notation. Standards: 8.F.1, 8.F.2.

curriculums.title: Structure of expressions
curriculums.description: Interpret expressions that represent a quantity
curriculums.subject: Seeing Structure in Expressions
curriculums.content: Description: Interpret expressions that represent a quantity. Standards: A-SSE.1, A-SSE.2.

curriculums.title: Advanced: Digital Literacy
curriculums.description: Critical evaluation of digital information and responsible technology use
curriculums.subject: Digital Skills
curriculums.content: Competency: Digital Literacy. Description: Critical evaluation of digital information and responsible technology use. Goal: SDG 4.4 - Technical and Vocational Skills

curriculums.title: Data interpretation
curriculums.description: Represent data with plots on the real number line
curriculums.subject: Interpreting Categorical and Quantitative Data
curriculums.content: Description: Represent data with plots on the real number line. Standards: S-ID.1, S-ID.2.

curriculums.title: Statistical inferences
curriculums.description: Understand statistics as a process for making inferences
curriculums.subject: Making Inferences and Justifying Conclusions
curriculums.content: Description: Understand statistics as a process for making inferences. Standards: S-IC.1, S-IC.2.

curriculums.title: Project: Scientific Inquiry & Sustainability
curriculums.description: Integrate knowledge to explore Investigation, experimentation, and evidence-based reasoning
curriculums.subject: Interdisciplinary Project
curriculums.content: Standard: UNESCO_SDG4 - Scientific Inquiry. Goal: SDG 4.7 - Education for Sustainable Development. Apply multiple skills.

curriculums.title: Application: Digital Literacy
curriculums.description: Real-world application of Critical evaluation of digital information and responsible technology use
curriculums.subject: Vocational Exploration
curriculums.content: Standard: UNESCO_SDG4 - Digital Literacy. Goal: SDG 4.4 - Technical and Vocational Skills. Case studies and practical skills.

curriculums.title: Basic English Communication
curriculums.description: Fundamental English speaking and listening skills
curriculums.subject: Professional English
curriculums.content: Description: Fundamental English speaking and listening skills. Standards: DK-ENG-BASIC.

curriculums.title: Innovation Challenge: Science
curriculums.description: Design an innovative solution related to Scientific Inquiry
curriculums.subject: Innovation Project
curriculums.content: Challenge based on UNESCO_SDG4 - Scientific Inquiry. Goal: SDG 4.7 - Education for Sustainable Development. Develop a creative project.

curriculums.title: Building functions
curriculums.description: Write a function that describes a relationship
curriculums.subject: Building Functions
curriculums.content: Description: Write a function that describes a relationship. Standards: F-BF.1, F-BF.3.
